name: Nyctophobia (itch) (Guillaume.Pauli)
description:
You're a young boy living in the 80's. He decides to go camping with his big brother in a forest near form where they live. The night falls and you'll try to keep the fire alive by harvesting resources in the forest. Why? because you are afraid of monsters living in the darkness. You will have to use every light sources in the forest to find your way to the resources. 

Your journey ends when the sun rises.
